summary: This is an email from a Special Agent in Charge at the DOJ Office of the Inspector General's New York Field Office, attempting to coordinate interviews regarding the Epstein matter on August 12, 2019. It shows ongoing investigative activity shortly after Epstein's arrest.

persons.name: Special Agent in Charge
persons.role: Special Agent in Charge, DOJ Office of the Inspector General
persons.context: Author of the email attempting to coordinate interviews regarding the Epstein matter on August 12, 2019.

events.title: Coordination of Epstein Matter Interviews
events.description: A Special Agent in Charge from the DOJ OIG New York Field Office attempts to coordinate interviews planned for that day regarding the Epstein investigation.

locations.name: One Battery Park Plaza
locations.context: Location of the U.S. Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General New York Field Office.

locations.name: New York NY
locations.context: Location of the OIG field office coordinating the Epstein matter interviews.

keyFacts: The DOJ Office of the Inspector General was actively involved in the Epstein investigation as of August 12, 2019.
Interviews were being conducted regarding the Epstein matter on that date.
The email shows coordination between different offices (OIG and USANYS) in the investigation.
The communication occurred shortly after Epstein's arrest in July 2019, indicating ongoing investigative activity.
